title: Can you tell me why the fields are locked at the new Olsen Park?  We went friday night and watched some of the co-ed softball games but when we went back the next day they had padlocks on the gates.  Did they spend the community money on the park then not allow the community to use the fields?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8125
